1. Phantom Blade Zero Confirmed to Be Console-Exclusive to PS5 for 12 Months  MP1st
  2. Phantom Blade Zero's kung fu combat balances approachability with authentic wuxia homage  Epic Games Store
  3. Phantom Blade Zero, The Kung Fu Punk Action Game, Gets September Release Date  Game Informer
  4. The most promising action game of 2026 finally has a release date, and we now know it'll launch on PC day one  PC Gamer
  5. Ghost of Tsushima Meets Sekiro, RPG Confirms Launch Date  GAMINGbible
